channel.title: Ring of Stone doesn't work... Help please? :] (Info Inside)

item.title: Ring of Stone doesn't work... Help please? :] (Info Inside)
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

ok so now i have:

public boolean wear(int wearID, int slot) { int targetSlot = 0; if((playerItems[slot] - 1) == wearID) { if(wearID == 6583) { npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

and

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == true){ npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

It still isn’t working…

My Scythe one works which is:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 == true){ npcId = 2862; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 1419 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

That works fine… Help please? :\

item.title: Ring of Stone doesn't work... Help please? :] (Info Inside)
item.dc:creator: @pies pies
item.description:
@pies wrote:

This is the code I have in client.java:

if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == true){ npcId = 2626; isNpc = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }else if (playerEquipment[playerRing] == 6583 == false){ isNpc = false; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

I checked this with another server source to compare incase I hade the wrong code, but they were both exacty the same only it doesn’t turn me into a stone when wielded.

Help please?

P.S: If you need anymore info on the problem, just say
